filesharing.core.client

Class FileDownloaderThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • filesharing.core.client.FileDownloaderThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PeerResponseProcessor, Runnable

    public class FileDownloaderThread
extends Object
implements Runnable, PeerResponseProcessor
    This is a downloader thread. It is a slave of FileDownloader. Connects to a single seeder, performing requests and processing responses.

      FileDownloaderThread(FileDownloader downloader, PeerConnection peerInformation)
      Constructs a new downloader thread
